description.p: A suite of LV2 plugins for noise reduction. Features:

ul.li: Adaptive noise reduction plugin for low latency voice denoise.
Manual noise capture based plugin for customizable noise reduction.
Adjustable Reduction and many other parameters to tweak the reduction.
Option to listen to the residual signal.
Noise profile saved with the session.

description.p: These are not maintained at the moment, use at your own peril.
